comment.author: 21061284@N05
comment._content: There's something about this that makes me feel sorry for them. :( No family or anything?

comment.author: 42269752@N00
comment._content:
I feel sorry for them too. Plus they call it the 'OLD men's home'!

Some of them may have fought in the wars in Sudan, or the Boer War - both of which took place before and in the early years of federation. Or perhaps they were struggling to pick themselves up after the depression.  Might explain how they ended up there!

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Food photography in Black & White, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 25096386@N02
comment._content: It's very sad to have to spend Christmas in an old man's home. However, it is better than being alone and/or homeless.
